data.name: CheckIn_Message
data.value: We are working on your changes
data.comment: Loading message that gets displayed for Check in functionality

data.name: CheckIn_Success
data.value: Your document has been checked in
data.comment: Success message that gets displayed when check in operation is completed

data.name: Checkout_Failure
data.value: Check out failed
data.comment: Failure message for check out functionality

data.name: Checkout_Message
data.value: We are checking out your file
data.comment: Loading message that gets displayed for check out functionality

data.name: CheckOut_Partial_Message
data.value: You already have the document(s) checked out in the Matter Center Beta
data.comment: Message that gets displayed when some of documents are not checked out from Matter Center Beta

data.name: Checkout_Success
data.value: Your document has been checked out in the Matter Center Beta
data.comment: Success message that gets displayed when Check Out action is completed

data.name: Detach_Document_Failure
data.value: Failed to detach document
data.comment: Failure message that gets displayed when unknown failure occurs for Detach functionality in One Drive

data.name: Detach_Document_Message
data.value: We are detaching your file from Matter Center Beta
data.comment: Loading message for Detach document functionality in One Drive

data.name: Detach_Document_Question
data.value: You are about to detach this file’s connection to Matter Center Beta where it will no longer be able to receive updates or perform actions related to Matter Center Beta.
data.comment: Question that is asked to the user whenever the user selects detach from Matter Center Beta as action in One Drive

data.name: Detach_Document_Success
data.value: Your file has been detached
data.comment: Message that gets displayed when all the documents are detached successfully

data.name: Generic_Failure_Message
data.value: Failed!
data.comment: Failed message

data.name: Generic_Success_Message
data.value: Success!
data.comment: Success message

data.name: Relax_Message
data.value: Sit back and Relax!
data.comment: Relax message that gets displayed while action is in progress

data.name: Update_Copy_Message
data.value: We are updating your document
data.comment: Loading message for Update Copy functionality

data.name: Update_Document_Failure
data.value: Failed to update document
data.comment: Failure message for update document functionality

data.name: Update_Document_Success
data.value: Your document has been updated
data.comment: Success message that gets displayed when all the documents have been updated

data.name: Not_Supported_Message
data.value: You can only perform these actions on documents from the Matter Center Beta
data.comment: Message that gets displayed when any normal document is selected for Legal Briefcase functionality

data.name: CheckIn_Partial
data.value: Some of the document(s) were checked in successfully
data.comment: Message that gets displayed when some of the documents were checked in from One Drive

data.name: Detach_Partial
data.value: Detach was successful for some document(s)
data.comment: Message that gets displayed when some of the documents are detached and some are not

data.name: Update_Document_Partial
data.value: Some document(s) were updated successfully
data.comment: Message that gets displayed when some of the documents were not updated

data.name: Good_News_Message
data.value: Good News!
data.comment: Good News message

data.name: Version_Info_Failed
data.value: Error occurred while retrieving version information
data.comment: Error message that gets displayed when unknown error occurs while retrieving version information for the documents

data.name: Legal_Briefcase_Folder_Name
data.value: My Legal Briefcase
data.comment: Name of the legal briefcase folder in user's OneDrive

data.name: Update_Document_Question
data.value: Updating your copy will overwrite your current OneDrive version and any changes you may have made.
data.comment: Question asked to user before performing update copy operation on One Drive

data.name: Question
data.value: Do you wish to continue?
data.comment: Message to ask user if he wants to perform a certain action

data.name: CheckIn_Already_Checkout
data.value: Some of the document(s) are checked out to different user
data.comment: Error message to be displayed when user clicks on check in and some of the documents are checked out to different users
